resources.string: SCIENCE: Cyclones spin in a clockwise direction in the southern hemisphere
LIFE: Goldfish only have a memory of three seconds
SCIENCE: Water is an example of a chemical element.
GEO: Hard: Brazil is the only country in the Americas to have the official language of Portuguese
GEO Hard: The Channel Tunnel is the longest rail tunnel in the world
SCIE: Hard: Electrons are larger than molecules.
GEO: The Atlantic Ocean is the biggest ocean on Earth.
SCIE Hard: The chemical make up food often changes when you cook it.
LIFE Easy: The human body has four lungs.
SCIE Hard: Atoms are most stable when their outer shells are full.
SCIEN Hard: Hard:Filtration separates mixtures based upon their particle size.
SCIEN Hard: Conductors have low resistance.
SCIEN Hard: Molecules can have atoms from more than one chemical element.
